io::FilterOutputStream Class Reference
[Input/output library]

#include <FilterOutputStream.h>

Inheritance diagram for io::FilterOutputStream:

[legend]
List of all members.

Detailed Description

FilterOutputStream overrides all methods of OutputStream with versions that pass all requests to the target output stream.

The target stream must be exist as long as FilterOutputStream is used.

 Returns number of bytes written to the stream.
